description.en: Spend 3 Hope to reroll any number of your damage dice on an attack that deals magic damage.
description.ru: Spend 3 Hope to reroll any number of your damage dice on an attack that deals magic damage.

description.en: You can sense the presence of magical people and objects within Close range.
description.ru: You can sense the presence of magical people and objects within Close range.

description.en: Make a Spellcast Roll (10). On a success, you create a minor visual illusion no larger than yourself within Close range. This illusion is convincing to anyone at Close range or farther.
description.ru: Make a Spellcast Roll (10). On a success, you create a minor visual illusion no larger than yourself within Close range. This illusion is convincing to anyone at Close range or farther.

description.en: You can place a domain card from your loadout into your vault and choose to either: 1) gain Hope equal to the level of the card, 2) enhance a spell that deals damage, gaining a bonus to your damage roll equal to twice the level of the card.
description.ru: You can place a domain card from your loadout into your vault and choose to either: 1) gain Hope equal to the level of the card, 2) enhance a spell that deals damage, gaining a bonus to your damage roll equal to twice the level of the card.

description.en: Choose one of the following elements at character creation. Spend a Hope and describe how your control over this element helps an action roll you're about to make, then either gain a +2 bonus to the roll or a +3 bonus to the roll's damage.
description.ru: Choose one of the following elements at character creation. Spend a Hope and describe how your control over this element helps an action roll you're about to make, then either gain a +2 bonus to the roll or a +3 bonus to the roll's damage.

description.en: You can call forth your element to protect you from harm. When an attack roll against you succeeds, you can mark a Stress and describe how you use your element to defend you. When you do, roll a d6 and add its result to your Evasion against the attack.
description.ru: You can call forth your element to protect you from harm. When an attack roll against you succeeds, you can mark a Stress and describe how you use your element to defend you. When you do, roll a d6 and add its result to your Evasion against the attack.

description.en: You can transform into a physical manifestation of your element. When you do, describe your transformation and choose two of the following benefits to gain until your next rest: 1) +4 bonus to your Severe threshold, 2) +1 bonus to a character trait of your choice, 3) +1 bonus to your Proficiency, 4) +2 bonus to your Evasion.
description.ru: You can transform into a physical manifestation of your element. When you do, describe your transformation and choose two of the following benefits to gain until your next rest: 1) +4 bonus to your Severe threshold, 2) +1 bonus to a character trait of your choice, 3) +1 bonus to your Proficiency, 4) +2 bonus to your Evasion.

description.en: After you cast a spell or make an attack using a weapon that deals magic damage, you can mark a Stress to do one of the following: 1) extend the spell or attack's reach by one range, 2) gain a +2 bonus to the action roll's result, 3) double a damage die of your choice, 4) hit an additional target within range.
description.ru: After you cast a spell or make an attack using a weapon that deals magic damage, you can mark a Stress to do one of the following: 1) extend the spell or attack's reach by one range, 2) gain a +2 bonus to the action roll's result, 3) double a damage die of your choice, 4) hit an additional target within range.

description.en: When you Help an Ally with a Spellcast Roll, you can roll a d8 as your advantage die. Once per long rest, after an ally has made a Spellcast Roll with your help, you can swap the results of their Duality Dice.
description.ru: When you Help an Ally with a Spellcast Roll, you can roll a d8 as your advantage die. Once per long rest, after an ally has made a Spellcast Roll with your help, you can swap the results of their Duality Dice.

description.en: When you take magic damage, you become Charged. Alternatively, you can spend 2 Hope to become Charged. When you successfully make an attack that deals magic damage while Charged, you can clear your Charge to either gain a +10 bonus to the damage roll or gain a +3 bonus to the Difficulty of a reaction roll the spell causes the target to make. You stop being Charged at your next long rest.
description.ru: When you take magic damage, you become Charged. Alternatively, you can spend 2 Hope to become Charged. When you successfully make an attack that deals magic damage while Charged, you can clear your Charge to either gain a +10 bonus to the damage roll or gain a +3 bonus to the Difficulty of a reaction roll the spell causes the target to make. You stop being Charged at your next long rest.
